reporter_caption.center: THE COACHMAN, INC. v. NORBERG, 118 R.I. 955 (1977)

caption.center: THE COACHMAN, INC. v. JOHN H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinion.posture: Petition for writ of certiorari is granted and the writ shall issue forthwith.
opinion.attorneys:
Moore, Virgadamo, Boyle Lynch, Ltd., Francis J. Boyle, for petitioner.
Julius C. Michaelson, Attorney General, Allen P.Rubine, Asst. Attorney General, Perry Shatkin, Chief Legal Officer, Taxation, for respondent.
